alert.note: Alert for West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 06 at 1:28PM PST until January 07 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Periods of Snow to Impact Northern Sierra Passes on Friday... .A quick-moving system will bring periods of snow to the mountains of northern California on Friday. While snow accumulations are not expected to be significant, motorists with travel plans in the mountains on Friday should expect travel delays and possible chain controls in the mountains. Always check with CalTrans for the latest road conditions. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 6 PM PST FRIDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected with slippery road conditions. Total wet snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches at pass level, with localized amounts up to 8 inches above the major passes. * WHERE...Western Plumas County/Lassen Park and West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada above 6,000 feet, including Interstate 80 at Donner Pass and Highway 50 at Echo Summit. * WHEN...6 AM to 6 PM Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for reduced visibilities at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Be prepared for snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: West Slope Northern Sierra Nevada; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
